name: ebcake-ctrl
description: Projects can bid with $Cake to win a 7-day farm

scripts.clean: rm -rf artifacts && rm -rf cache && rm -rf coverage && rm -rf typechain
scripts.deploy:bsc: pnpm run prettier && npx hardhat deploy --network bsc && ts-node -T ../../shared/scripts/clean-solc-inputs.ts
scripts.deploy:bsctest: pnpm run prettier && npx hardhat deploy --network bsctest && ts-node -T ../../shared/scripts/clean-solc-inputs.ts
scripts.deploy:local: pnpm run prettier && npx hardhat deploy --network local
scripts.verify:bsc: pnpm run prettier && npx hardhat --network bsc etherscan-verify && npx hardhat --network bsc verify:duet
scripts.verify:bsctest: pnpm run prettier && npx hardhat --network bsctest etherscan-verify && npx hardhat --network bsctest verify:duet
